review: You have to have a strong internet signal. If you don't, the movies or songs keep getting buffering.

review: I dumped cable after buying this. No more 200.00 a month bills. You can rent new releases and there are plenty of shows and movies to keep adults and kids entertained.

review: Works great, a number of really nice fetures, wish it would work with all the other sites that I watch but when companies make contracts together that limits the internet.
